data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word أَلَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
The word نَشْرَحْ comes from the root ش ر ح and is associated with the meanings: to open/enlarge/expand/spread, uncover/disclose/explain.

data.meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.
data.sentence: The word صَدْرَكَ comes from the root ص د ر and is associated with the meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.
